div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1571 Kessab ?, c. 18 km. S of anc. Seleuceia Pieria, Seleucis, 1947 Burial: c. 95 B.C. (Seyrig) Contents: 22 AE Antiochus IV: 1 (as Rois de Syrie 431) Tryphon: 1 (as Rois 1051) Antiochus VII: 4 (1 as Rois 1118, 3 as 1140) Demetrius II, 2nd reign: 6 (as Rois 1193, 1237) Antiochus VIII: 3 (1 as Rois 1339, 2 as 1374) Antiochus IX: 1 (as Rois 1492) Aradus: 1 (as BMC 104 ff.) Byblus: 1 (as BMC 18) Ptolemy II: Tyre 1 (as Svoronos 711) Ptolemy III: Ace 2 (as Sv. 1060) Unc.: 1 Disposition: dispersed Information from H. Seyrig
